loginDescription: Shyiramo umwirondoro wawe kugira ngo ubashe kwinjira mu gice cy'ubuyobozi.
registerDescription: Fungura konti nshya y'ubuyobozi ukoresheje kode y'ibanga.
systemDefaultsDescription: Shiraho amakuru y'ishuri n'ibipimo ngenderwaho muri sisitemu.
passMarkDescription: Iri nota (50) rikoreshwa muri sisitemu yose mu kugenagutsinda cyangwa gutsindwa.
themeDescription: Uburyo bw'umwijima bushobora guhindurwa hakoreshejwe akabuto k'izuba/ukwezi hejuru.
notificationsDescription: Imenyesha rya email ku byabaye muri sisitemu riteganyijwe mu gihe kizaza.
advancedFeaturesDescription: Ibyiyongereyeho nk'uburyo bwo kohereza amakuru muri PDF/Excel, igenamiterere rirambuye rya raporo, n'uburyo bw'itumanaho (SMS/email) biteganyijwe. Export CSV isanzwe irahari.
noPermissionSystemSettings: Ntabwo wemerewe guhindura igenamiterere rya sisitemu.
homePagePurpose: Gucunga neza amanota y'abanyeshuri, gutegura raporo, no koroshya imiyoborere y'ishuri.
platformGoalEN: A smart education platform for managing student grades, attendance, and communication with parents — making the teacher’s work easier and more effective.
platformGoalRW: Urubuga rw’ikoranabuhanga rufasha mu gucunga amanota y’abanyeshuri, imyitwarire, no gutumanaho n’ababyeyi — koroshya akazi k’umwarimu.
platformGoalFR: Une plateforme intelligente pour gérer les notes, la présence des élèves et communiquer avec les parents — facilitant le travail des enseignants.
featureGradeManagementDesc: Andika kandi ubike amanota y'abanyeshuri mu buryo nyabwo.
featureSmsEmailDesc: Ohereza amanota n'amakuru ku babyeyi ukoresheje SMS/Email (mu gihe kizaza).
featureTeacherStudentReportsDesc: Tegura raporo ku musaruro w'abarimu n'abanyeshuri.
featureAssignmentsDesc: Tanga kandi ukurikirane imikoro y'abanyeshuri (mu gihe kizaza).
featurePhotosDocumentsDesc: Bika amafoto cyangwa inyandiko z'abanyeshuri mu mutekano (mu gihe kizaza).
